name: Solar TD
description:
Created for the LibGDX game jam.

Takes a lot of inspiration from Onslaught TD, an old flash game. Now its in HTML5 and in space, with some other new mechanics.

There is no dev log, because over break I was focusing on family and only working on this in the down times. I didn't want to commit to documenting everything, apart from the commits themselves.

Anyways, I do have the source code available on github.
